sense.name: the reflective quality of lustrousness, radiance
sense.examples: Their faces had a shine from perspiration. The shine on your floor will last for weeks with this floor polish. That seaside resort has lost its shine in recent years. (metaphoric extension)

sense.name: the act of imparting luster to an object
sense.examples: John gave his black dress shoes a quick shine with polish. The sterling silver cutlery needs a shine about once a month.
